existing_features.title: When the "Show Physician Signature Fields" toggle is ON, update the printed reportâ€™s final-page physician signature section to include three writable underline lines for manual writing: (1) Physician Name, (2) Physician Signature, and (3) Date. Each field must show its label followed by an underline line suitable for handwriting.

new_feature_requests.summary: When the toggle is on, add writable underlines after Physician's Name, Signature, and Date fields on the final-page physician section.

projectName: Add writable underlines for Physician Name, Signature, and Date when physician signature toggle is on
